title: Apple Growers
alt: Hopefully in a couple of weeks we'll be able to resume our apple-focused updates, because we have SO MUCH to say about Cosmic Crisp.
transcript:
[Beret Guy, Megan, and Cueball stand behind a podium with an image of an apple on the front of it]
Megan: *ahem* The state apple-growers' association has decided to formally call on President Donald Trump to resign.
[A wider shot shows Beret Guy, Megan, and Cueball on a stage. In the audience are three people, including Ponytail.]
Ponytail: Weren't you meeting to update the standards for new apple varieties?
Megan: Yes, but we talked it over and this is what we decided. We feel strongly that this is important.
[There is a narrow shot of Megan behind the podium.]
[voice from off-panel]: Did you discuss anything on your actual agenda?
Megan: Thanks for the question! We did not.
[Beret Guy, Megan, and Cueball stand behind a podium with an apple on it]
[voice from off-panel]: Do you have any apple-related announcements at all?
Megan: Uh, apples are great. Best fruit. Everyone should buy 1,000 of them. We're a little distracted right now, okay??
